fields.setDefaultOnlyIfRequired: Apply default value only if required
fields.noEmptyString: Empty string value is not allowed

tooltips.isMultilang: Automatic creation of fields via cloning the current one as many times as there are locales activated in the Multi-Languages Settings.
tooltips.required: Field will be mandatory. Can't be left empty.
tooltips.readOnly: Field value can't be specified by user.
tooltips.pattern: To enable only capital letters with 10-symbol length use "/^[A-Z]{1,10}$/"
tooltips.default: Value will be set by default upon creating.
tooltips.isSorted: Options will be sorted after saving.
tooltips.dropdown: Do not use the dropdown if there are more than 300 options in the list.
